version_description:
-The sharing of albums was intensively optimized;
 -Bugs fixed to yield a better Fotoplace.

video fuction is available，video function，available ！available ！available！
video fuction is available in zuji,in zuji ! in zuji ! in zuji!
video fuction is finally available in zuji !finally！finally！finally！

1、Do you use the Vedio fuction in ZUJI?We added "comic" template, this new animation style will take you fly ,take you WOW!
2、Video Collection Campaign is now online，you must could win prizes，withing the potential of big director.
3、Several small bug has fixed, makes it more smooth in use.

1, Totally a different version because Fotoplace destroyed itself and strongly reborn. So I am a new baby：）
2, Discovery channel was taken away by aliens. Don't miss it. We dressed up the Space (community square) and hope you will likeit!
3, Everyone will be a peer reviewer now in Fotoplace.
4, Two templates added in video feature as new toys to blow your mind.
5, Lovely programmers fixed numerous small bugs to make you more comfortable.

1、 The new version of fotoplace comes. This time,the bug under 16:9 mode which makes stickers out of shape has been repaired. Under the movie mode, you can become more beautiful and lovely than before.
2、 The problem that in the Likes list pictures do not show has also been fixed. You can browse your favorite collections normally. Let's go to see quickly.
3、 The cool movie you made on the fotoplace can show completely on the microblog. Share it and show off to your microblog friends.
4、The lovely Industrious programmers also fix several hidden bugs quietly. In short, the use is becoming more smooth.

1, Storage space in the new version of the Fotoplace become a full reduction of half, the content become more abundant! You no longer have to worry about data and memory, and rest assured that you can use it boldly.
2, Fotoplace stickers library finally on line. Those stickers all you miss are all back, and the Fotoplace will make your beautiful photo more colorful.
3, The editor of the Fotoplace have organised  thousands of subtitles over the night. Nearly ten thousand buzzwords let you occupy your circle of friends.
4, Various bug fixes to enhance the overall performance of the app. It’s so smooth that you can’t stop.If you do not believe, you can have a try?

1, The new version of Fotoplace can apply for V certification to you. Everyone has the opportunity to become your field of telant people, maybe your life can be changed from now on.
2, Label function is optimized. In the label, you can find the people you are interested in more easily. New features should have a try, maybe you will find the other half of life .
3, The programmers optimize entire product silently, so you can feel the operation become more fluent i without noticing.

1,Fotoplace Spring Festival grand gift pack is on-line! The head and the Video Theme become different，they are cute,right? 
2,The original "one step landscaping" function was replaced with the theme template function completely,20 Themes of movie poster, which can let you become the protagonist of the movie in one second,it's true.
3, Double-exposure function fully optimized, we achieved a comparable superimposed function of PS, if you have enough creativity，you can make a stunning blockbuster.
4, Consummate many details, so you have more pleasure to use. At last wish every users Happy Spring Festival!

1. The Fotoplace tag have a new way to use, it is become easy to get the template to make you photo more beautiful
2. New user new benefits, the new version add interest to choose, no matter how minority your interest is, you will find some person have the same interest with you.
3. Synchronous your address book，you will have a new discovery, you will find you have so many friend in the Fotoplace，let us have a look which kind of picture have they ever been submit?
4. Add the entrance of the contribute to the home page, from today your creative photo with more opportunities to be seen by other people. As if you will become famous inadvertently. Do you feel tension?

1. The video function of the Fotoplace increased dramatically, said it may surprise you, but the app on your hands since become the best cell phone video editing software of the old world.I asked you,do you feel happy now.
2. After all, now it has entered the era of ios11, the fotoplace no longer supports the ios 7 system, every friend of the fotoplace remember timely update oh.
3. The use of fluency, anyway, your beloved fotoplace will only make you more and more love.

1, Look at the blackboard, emphasize again，the best video editing application of the eastern hemisphere is in your hand now, no better, emphasize again, no better!!!
